name: Verve
description: The future of interactive content is here, and fully decentralized! Introducing Verve - interactive streaming, reimagined. Verve's mission is to give the power back to the users by empowering streamers, content creators, and viewers with a rewarding, user owned, and future-proof platform. As a streamer, you are put at the helm and given all the tools and features to create the engaging and interactive content to develop the reach you've been dreaming of. There is no centralization of content, no insane fees taken from streamers income, interactivity with your community and viewers, NFT clipping tools of your iconic moments, a stream mirroring system, and much more! As a viewer you'll be able to view, interact, and share content all while earning! With Verve's watch-to-earn system you'll be racking up $VERV just by hanging out with your favorite creators! Since being fueled by the Velas blockchain, all transactions like donations or purchases of NFTs are virtually instant, secure, and at a fraction of the cost of other networks!
